title: League of Draven, let it exist.
body:
_**Please, bring it back and keep it for the weekend as you were going to. I didn't have my time to play the game on the 1st one, I'm sure there're other people, who feel the same way. After all it was an Aplril's PRANK, not everyone had to enjoy it. Moreover it wasn't in all types of games. It was the MAIN Idea of this April Fool's Day. There's no URF, there's NO League Of Draven. .. nothing. It is just sad. 
People like to complain more than appreciate things, that's why there're so much more poeple who actually took their time and posted their negative feedback, then those, who actually did or could possibly enjoy the idea. 
Draven is not my main champion, but The Idea was Really GOOD and it was in the context of the event. **_

{{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Whatever the reason Riot had for disabling League of Draven, there's a fair point to be made about people not appreciating things.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} 
There's a small part of me that hopes Riot does neither Rotating Queue or URF and **that's** the April Fools prank.
:V
I agree, please bring it back!
